oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Explanation of various personal names was given, in the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-10. 4751-4754, 4758-4777, 18. 5373 rev., 19. 5505 rev. and 5506 rev., 20. 5572 and 5573, 5605-5607). The reason for the naming of Dia!kwain's uncle, |kai kwa.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Why Dia!kwain's uncle |kai kwa received his name
